extracted_playbook.title: Check Device Version
extracted_playbook.description: Verify if the Tab-Ex 02 device is running version <= v01.03.2020.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the device running version <= v01.03.2020?

extracted_playbook.title: Plan for Device Update
extracted_playbook.description: Prepare for the planned update for Tab-Ex 02, scheduled for 05/2020, to patch all affected devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Network and Software Installations
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that outgoing connections and local software installations are configured by administrators.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Data Connection Encryption
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that data connections are encrypted using protocols such as HTTPS or SSH.
